review: Dr. Kunal was highly instrumental in helping me sort out my shoulder dislocation. To date, he calls and checks on my progress. Its a blessing to have such a caring and professional doctor. I can't think of anyone better.
I visited last year for my mother Chennai Apollo..it's ready very good experience sir is very friendly and positive talking...till now we are under consultation with him through online...
